Introduction
This topic contains information on a child’s income deductions, including
deduction from child’s earned income
deducting a child’s income
child’s postsecondary education expenses
, and
deducting a child’s postsecondary education expenses
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section K - Other Deductible Expenses
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section K
